description:
Gajeel is trapped in Torafuzar`s toxic water. Even though his lungs are filled with air thanks to Levy, his body is quickly filling up with poison. And later, despite {\i1}his{\i0} body being filled with anti-magic particles, Laxus takes a last stand against the immortal Tempester.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 冥府の門[タルタロス]編 鋼
